targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
     $timeSeries as t,
	  alias, toString(dst_port) as dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category,
    (sum(flow_src_packets_processed)+sum(flow_src_packets_processed)) as t_sum
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter and ndpi_proto NOT LIKE '%BIOS%' and dst_port != 0

GROUP BY t, alias, dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
     (intDiv(toUInt32(flow_first_seen), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
	  alias, toString(dst_port) as dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category,
    (sum(flow_src_packets_processed)+sum(flow_src_packets_processed)) as t_sum
FROM default.Flow

WHERE flow_first_seen >= toDateTime(1671695332) AND flow_first_seen <= toDateTime(1671695632) and ndpi_proto NOT LIKE '%BIOS%' and dst_port != 0

GROUP BY t, alias, dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category

ORDER BY t

panels.title: Device, Dest Port, Ndpi Proto, Ndpi Category

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    hop(flow_first_seen, toIntervalSecond('30'), toIntervalSecond('30')) as t,
	  alias, toString(dst_port) as dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category,
    (sum(flow_src_packets_processed)+sum(flow_src_packets_processed)) as t_sum
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter and ndpi_proto NOT LIKE '%BIOS%' and dst_port != 0

GROUP BY t, alias, dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    hop(flow_first_seen, toIntervalSecond('30'), toIntervalSecond('30')) as t,
	  alias, toString(dst_port) as dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category,
    (sum(flow_src_packets_processed)+sum(flow_src_packets_processed)) as t_sum
FROM default.Flow

WHERE flow_first_seen >= toDateTime(1671695362) AND flow_first_seen <= toDateTime(1671695662) and ndpi_proto NOT LIKE '%BIOS%' and dst_port != 0

GROUP BY t, alias, dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category

ORDER BY t

panels.title: Device, Dest Port, Ndpi Proto, Ndpi Category

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    
    hop((flow_first_seen  + interval 28800 second), toIntervalMinute('1'), toIntervalMinute('1')) AS t,
    alias,
    sum(flow_src_packets_processed) AS src,
    sum(flow_dst_packets_processed) AS dst
FROM Flow
GROUP BY t, alias
order by t desc limit 15
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    
    hop((flow_first_seen  + interval 28800 second), toIntervalMinute('1'), toIntervalMinute('1')) AS t,
    alias,
    sum(flow_src_packets_processed) AS src,
    sum(flow_dst_packets_processed) AS dst
FROM Flow
GROUP BY t, alias
order by t desc limit 15

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    hop((flow_first_seen + interval 28800 second), toIntervalMinute('60'), toIntervalMinute('60')) AS t,
    alias,
    sum(flow_src_packets_processed) AS src,
    sum(flow_dst_packets_processed) AS dst
FROM Flow
GROUP BY t, alias
order by t desc limit 20
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    hop((flow_first_seen + interval 28800 second), toIntervalMinute('60'), toIntervalMinute('60')) AS t,
    alias,
    sum(flow_src_packets_processed) AS src,
    sum(flow_dst_packets_processed) AS dst
FROM Flow
GROUP BY t, alias
order by t desc limit 20

panels.title: Device Flow Count Top 20(60 min Stack)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    SUM(CASE WHEN alias = 'manager' THEN (flow_src_packets_processed+flow_src_packets_processed) else 0 END) as manager
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(flow_first_seen), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    SUM(CASE WHEN alias = 'manager' THEN (flow_src_packets_processed+flow_src_packets_processed) else 0 END) as manager
FROM default.Flow

WHERE flow_first_seen >= toDateTime(1671686907) AND flow_first_seen <= toDateTime(1671687207)

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

FROM default.Flow

WHERE flow_first_seen >= toDateTime(1671686907) AND flow_first_seen <= toDateTime(1671687207)

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
Select
   alias, toString(dst_port) as dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category,
   (SUM(flow_src_packets_processed)+SUM(flow_dst_packets_processed)) t_sum
From Flow
where ndpi_proto NOT LIKE '%BIOS%' and dst_port != 0
GROUP BY alias, dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category

ORDER BY t_sum desc
targets.rawQuery:
Select
   alias, toString(dst_port) as dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category,
   (SUM(flow_src_packets_processed)+SUM(flow_dst_packets_processed)) t_sum
From Flow
where ndpi_proto NOT LIKE '%BIOS%' and dst_port != 0
GROUP BY alias, dst_p, ndpi_proto, ndpi_category

ORDER BY t_sum desc

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
   alias, src_ip, ndpi_proto, (SUM(flow_src_packets_processed)+SUM(flow_dst_packets_processed)) t_sum
FROM Flow
GROUP BY alias, src_ip, ndpi_proto
ORDER BY t_sum desc
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 
   alias, src_ip, ndpi_proto, (SUM(flow_src_packets_processed)+SUM(flow_dst_packets_processed)) t_sum
FROM Flow
GROUP BY alias, src_ip, ndpi_proto
ORDER BY t_sum desc

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
 alias, dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, toString(src_port) as src_p, toString(dst_port) as dst_p, ndpi_proto,
 (sum(flow_src_packets_processed) + sum(flow_dst_packets_processed)) as total_sum
FROM Flow
GROUP BY alias, dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_p , dst_p, ndpi_proto
ORDER BY total_sum desc limit 1000
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
 alias, dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, toString(src_port) as src_p, toString(dst_port) as dst_p, ndpi_proto,
 (sum(flow_src_packets_processed) + sum(flow_dst_packets_processed)) as total_sum
FROM Flow
GROUP BY alias, dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_p , dst_p, ndpi_proto
ORDER BY total_sum desc limit 1000

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    src_ip, ndpi_proto,
    SUM(flow_src_packets_processed)
FROM Flow
WHERE src_ip LIKE ('%.%')
GROUP BY src_ip, ndpi_proto
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    src_ip, ndpi_proto,
    SUM(flow_src_packets_processed)
FROM Flow
WHERE src_ip LIKE ('%.%')
GROUP BY src_ip, ndpi_proto

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    src_ip, SUM(flow_src_packets_processed) as c
FROM Flow
WHERE src_ip LIKE ('%.%')
GROUP BY src_ip
order by c desc
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    src_ip, SUM(flow_src_packets_processed) as c
FROM Flow
WHERE src_ip LIKE ('%.%')
GROUP BY src_ip
order by c desc

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    dst_ip, (sum(flow_dst_packets_processed)) as c
FROM Flow
WHERE dst_ip LIKE ('%.%')
GROUP BY dst_ip
order by c desc
targets.rawQuery:

    dst_ip, (sum(flow_dst_packets_processed)) as c

FROM Flow

GROUP BY src_ip
order by c desc

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
 dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_port, dst_port,
 sum(flow_dst_packets_processed) as dst_sum,
 sum(flow_src_packets_processed) as src_sum,
 (dst_sum+src_sum) as src_dst,
 Count(*) as total_sum
FROM Flow
GROUP BY dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_port , dst_port
ORDER BY src_dst desc limit 1000
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
 dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_port, dst_port,
 sum(flow_dst_packets_processed) as dst_sum,
 sum(flow_src_packets_processed) as src_sum,
 (dst_sum+src_sum) as src_dst,
 Count(*) as total_sum
FROM Flow
GROUP BY dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_port , dst_port
ORDER BY src_dst desc limit 1000

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
 dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_port, dst_port, Count(*) as total_sum,
 sum(flow_dst_packets_processed) as dst_sum,
 sum(flow_src_packets_processed) as src_sum,
 (dst_sum+src_sum) as dst_src
FROM Flow
GROUP BY dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_port , dst_port
ORDER BY dst_src desc limit 1000
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
 dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_port, dst_port, Count(*) as total_sum,
 sum(flow_dst_packets_processed) as dst_sum,
 sum(flow_src_packets_processed) as src_sum,
 (dst_sum+src_sum) as dst_src
FROM Flow
GROUP BY dst_ip, src_ip, l4_proto, src_port , dst_port
ORDER BY dst_src desc limit 1000
